entry.title: Thursday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness this evening. Fog at times. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 32 this evening. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Thursday 09 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 16. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Fog at times. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 26 in the morning and minus 20 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Thursday 09 March 2023
